intro.description: In a few steps, this cheat sheet will guide you through the import of a TestSpecification.

item.title: Open menu
item.description: First, move the mouse cursor into the "GlobalTester Navigator" window. Right-click, and choose "Import".

item.title: Select TestSpecification
item.description: In the tree view, select "GlobalTester > Import TestSpecification from Plugin". Click the "Next" button.

item.title: Choose the TestSpecification you want to import
item.description: In the list, you can choose the TestSpecification you want to import. Just below the list you will find the bundle symbolic name of the last selected TestSpecification. Also a description of the TestSpecification is given so that you can get a quick overview of its purpose. For the ease of use several TestSpecifications can be selected for import. Then click "Finish".
item.onCompletion: Congratulations! You have just learned how to import a TestSpecification!
